entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then a few flurries. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
